description.narrative:
L’assistance technique est un soutien non financier fourni par des spécialistes. Elle peut revêtir plusieurs formes : partage d’information et de savoir-faire, formation et services-conseils.
L’assistance technique fournie dans le cadre du PEF est appelée aide ciblée aux pays. Ce type de soutien vise principalement à payer le personnel basé en permanence dans les bureaux pays des partenaires. Il repose sur la demande et les besoins identifiés par les pays eux-mêmes.

Technical assistance is non-financial support provided by specialists. It can take the form of sharing information and expertise, training and consulting services.
The technical assistance provided through PEF is called targeted country assistance (TCA). This type of support mainly consists of staff permanently based in partners’ country offices. It is based on the demand and needs identified by the countries themselves.

Cette activité détaille notre travail sur le Aide ciblée aux pays en Sénégal (le), grâce à la mise à disposition des données budgétaires et des transactions. Nous fournissons également les documents pertinents qui guident ces activités que sont les formulaires de demande de soutien fournis par le gouvernement de Sénégal (le) ainsi que les lettres de décisions émises par Gavi, pour progresser. Ces documents décrivent les activités, les objectifs ainsi que les bénéficiaires.

This activity details our work on Targeted country assistance in Senegal through the provision of budget and transaction data. We also provide the relevant documents that guide these activities, which are the support request proposal(s) provided by the Government of Senegal, as well as the decision letter(s) issued by Gavi, for progress. These documents describe the activities, the objectives as well as the beneficiaries.

title.narrative: Meningitis surveillance continues at 2 sites; improved epidemiologic and laboratory capacity for detection and characterization of pathogens at both sites

target.value: Enhancing capacity and strengthening surveillance systems for vaccine-preventable diseases, in particular, bacterial meningitis, in Senegal by 1) maintaining laboratory and epidemiologic capacity for vaccine-preventable disease meningitis surveillance at CHNEAR and LNSP; 2) conduct national workshop for clinicians at regional levels on vaccine-preventable disease surveillance for meningitis by building clinical capacity for lumbar punctures and assuring data quality by reinforcing adherence to case definitions

Enhancing capacity and strengthening surveillance systems for vaccine-preventable diseases, in particular, bacterial meningitis, in Senegal by 1) maintaining laboratory and epidemiologic capacity for vaccine-preventable disease meningitis surveillance at CHNEAR and LNSP; 2) conduct national workshop for clinicians at regional levels on vaccine-preventable disease surveillance for meningitis by building clinical capacity for lumbar punctures and assuring data quality by reinforcing adherence to case definitions
